and we want to understand kind of the pain points that those folks had and see what sort of tools we could bring to
bear to improve their team productivity and there were kind of three things that really jumped out uh in terms
of kind of team dynamics today one is that business needs are
continuously evolving like how a team operates this week actually in four weeks from now they're on to new projects
their needs have evolved their needs have changed and frankly the the existing tool sets that
teams are using just isn't keeping up with that ever-changing landscape um and the reality of that is that teams have then
been trying to use either kind of off-the-shelf software as tooling to help them um be it you know custom project
management software event management tools task tracking tools and collectively like they're all great
but they're not perfect and uh the real problem is is that then that creates a need where these business
teams then turn around to their technical teams and say hey i need some help um and
unfortunately that just creates such a problem and backlog and ideas like i'd love to build you that tool i just simply don't have the time the budget
the money the manpower um the the people to make that happen um and so business teams are really left
kind of standing and not being as productive as they they could be and so it's really based on that that we
set out on this vision of of bringing honeycomb to market and it was all about how do we empower
those business users uh to essentially build their own apps their own tools to really solve their team's productivity
challenges and we didn't want to stray too far from this idea of like it's business users this isn't
really about empowering folks are already really great technical folks who can use the
full power of things like awf right this is about i'm a program manager i sit in a business maybe i'm

um a video production shoot and i've got all these files i want to move around the stakeholders working on projects how do
i keep track of that stuff um and like how i do it as a team is very different from how
another team in another company does that um and so how do i build the right sort of tools to enable those sorts of
people and these kind of program managers marketers business analysts
they kind of have four key traits they really care about one they they really want to be able to stay
in the loop of what's going on two we know that um people are more and more mobile and
so they want the ability to get access to data that's live updated on their mobile devices and that's a challenge there a lot of
the tools are great maybe on the on the mac or the pc but they don't work great on the mobile device and customers have become so familiar
with the great experience of apps on mobile devices but when it comes to kind of team business tools they've been left a
little one thing at the same time they want to personalize that experience as i said teams
teams needs are rather unique um and then there is way too much manual
process um in in businesses and so any ways that we can help teams and automate and improve those processes
just gives time back to people individuals to focus on more high value items and so those were kind of core four
capabilities that we wanted to bring to the product um and that's where we came out with uh the capabilities of
honeycomb and so kind of pivoting back to this idea of a business user um who's familiar with a certain set of
tools today we wanted to go where and enable them with the skills that they have and so number one of that
is that we wanted to go with their skills with spreadsheets spreadsheets are very ubiquitous in business um and we wanted to leverage the the
skills that people have in that space to use them to manage the data that they have and so with that inside of honeycomb we
have kind of four key capabilities to enable people to build that one we have tables they act like
